articles.title: American Trevor Reed released from Russia in prisoner swap - CNN
articles.description: American Trevor Reed, a US citizen and former Marine who had been detained in Russia since 2019, has been released in a prisoner swap.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)American Trevor Reed, a US citizen and former Marine who had been detained in Russia since 2019, has been released in a prisoner swap.
